content:
A box of supplies tumbles off of Raemon's hoversled and onto the ground. "Ah, sorry about this old thing," Raemon says, slapping the side of the sled. "It's not used to carrying this heavy of a load. Here, let me help you with that…"

Discard all   from Raemon. Either move 2 supplies from among features in play to Raemon, or each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
